name: add_branding
description: Simple branding template with custom background, logo in top right corner, and company name at bottom

fieldPrompt.background_image_url: Enter the URL of your background image. This will be used as the full background of the template. For best results, use a high-resolution image (1080x1080 or larger).
fieldPrompt.logo_url: Enter the URL of your company logo. The logo will be placed in the top right corner of the template. For best results, use a logo with a transparent background in PNG format.
fieldPrompt.company_name: Enter your company name as you want it to appear at the bottom of the template. This will be displayed in white text for good contrast against most backgrounds.
